content.rendered:
Progressives with Hi-adaptability Vision Comfort.

When you need wider viewing area, lnnolite advanced progressive lenses are just right for you. Its freeform design concentrates in reducing the unwanted astigmatism, while offering expanded viewing area and enhanced visual comfort.

Features



  • Offers expanded viewing area
  • Delivers superior vision at all distances
  • Less peripheral distortion
  • Low astigmatism provides visual comfort
  • Smooth transition from near to far
  • Easy adaptation
  • Performance optimised

Ratings




Ask for Yash O&L Authenticity Card for your lenses

Lens Design
